explanation: The stage direction describes a scene setting with the appearance of generals and officers, as well as the mention of the location of the doors. It provides a description of the stage and the action happening outside, which fits the 'setting' category.
stgdir: Les cris redoublent en dehors, les tambours battent, une foule de généraux et d'officiers d'état major paraissent au fond et se placent vis-à-vis les portes vitrées.
